title: How much RAM do i need?
body: I have a laptop with 2 GB ram. It's pretty new, got it in February. Is this enough ram to play?

replies.body:
2GB meets the minimum specs, however, 4GB is recommended as per our [specs article.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements/)

Let me know if you have any other questions.
That's more then enough have fun
